# UIAlertController.Style

**Enumeration**

Constants indicating the type of alert to display.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Constants

- **UIAlertController.Style.actionSheet**: An action sheet displayed by the view controller that presented it.
- **UIAlertController.Style.alert**: An alert displayed modally for the app.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring the alert

- **title**: The title of the alert.
- **message**: Descriptive text that provides more details about the reason for the alert.
- **preferredStyle**: The style of the alert controller.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
